name: Amber Country
summary: "Live the mysterious adventure of Steven O'Hara, the blind detective that solves cases using a strange method: "The Dreams". A recurring nightmare will force him to take some holidays in the "fancy" Amber County but he doesn't know that he will be involved in something greater than himself and the suicide of the young Berry Olsen will be only the beginning of his problems and of the County's ones. Amber County is a mix made by the old Point & Click games and the new Narrative First Person Adventures. Switch between the two mechanics by simply clicking a button, solve the puzzles and live an incredible and mysterious adventure in this strange county where the "time doesn't work as it should"."
